content.raw: I removed the dependency on webkit. We were using `QWebView` in a single place to view a hotkey table. Instead of maintaining the hotkey html both [online](http://gazebosim.org/hotkeys.html) and in gazebo's source, the `HotKey` help menu item now open a webpage to `http://gazbosim.org/hotkeys.html`.
content.html: I removed the dependency on webkit. We were using QWebView in a single place to view a hotkey table. Instead of maintaining the hotkey html both online and in gazebo's source, the HotKey help menu item now open a webpage to http://gazbosim.org/hotkeys.html.
